Tried out some of the missiles. Models are very nice, but effects need more work and some missiles behave weird. Isn't it possible to use Baha's effects?

Here are some thing I've thought about:

- Falcon nuclear missile is IR guided - should be radar. It also won't explode even if it already lost the target but still can destroy it.

- Tomahawk flies in random orientation, usually upside down. Maybe that's due to terminalManeuvering = true? Also, its booster is too powerful - real one accelerates slower and is at smaller altitude when booster burns out.

- RIM-174 accelerates like crazy, to orbital speeds, and can not maneuver at all in atmosphere. When I launched it vertically it couldn't get to fly horizontally - accelerates very fast and has low max AoA.

- RIM-116 doesn't deploy its fins after launch. Looks reallt weird.

- 9M120 has misaligned smoke and fire particles in exhaust.

- Haven't dropped BLU-82 yet, but it cries for parachute bag model on the back, and preferably at least simple parachute model.

- Downscaling all weapons to 0.75 or 0.64 with config works great - otherwise they are simply too large for tiny KSP parts. I did the same to all Baha's missiles. Maybe you should provide optional config for MM?

> 
> @PART[PEW\*] // P.E.W. weapons 
> {
> 
>  @rescaleFactor = 0.75
> 
> }
